name: horse lol
description:
Version 21 (8/21/22 ~3:10PM)

Content:

Added 1,2,3 and 4 to spawn a range of objects

Added Right click, Shift and WASD to control the new free camera

Added Left click on objects to pick them up

Added Escape to close game

Added Dancing baby

Added Misc objects

Possibly coming in next update from now:

Cars

more objects spawnable or not

better map

more soundboard options

Version 420 (8/21/22 ~1:50PM ):

Content:

Added T to play fart sound

Added G to play goofy sound

Added Space to pause and play horse

Added Terrain
